about_the_game:
About this game

"Lingering" is a third-person horizontal horror, decryption, and adventure game.
You will play as a little boy named Ayu. On the eve of your 7th birthday, your mother's screams tear through the silent night. Just then, a low voice, as if from another world, comes from outside the window, coldly guiding you to escape...

During your escape, unknown horrors lurk in the darkness. Whispers, shadows, and eerie laughter constantly tear at your nerves...


Game Features

 ●Moderate horror without excessive jump scares. The horror atmosphere is enhanced through background music and dark graphics.
 ●A plot-driven puzzle adventure game where you use hundreds of items, collect information from the map, solve various puzzles, gather fragmented information, and uncover the truth hidden beneath layers of mist.
 ●Experience four super-large maps and over 200 freely explorable rooms. Encounter dozens of monsters and bosses.
 ●Unrestricted gameplay. Face monsters and bosses, you can use weapons to defeat them once and for all, or evade them through stealth. When confronted with puzzles, you can solve them through violent means or gradually solve them through decryption.

Ultimate Comfortable Micro-Horror Feeling

●A moderately horrifying game atmosphere as you explore the hidden truth in the dark maps.
●Return to childhood nightmares, with eerie atmospheres pervasive in everyday scenes.

Intense and Thrilling Adventure

  • Beware of those eerie monsters and use the correct methods to evade or defeat them

  • Bizarre monster designs that evoke deep-seated fears.

    Progressive Puzzle Solving

    ●Puzzles with just the right level of difficulty—not too hard but still challenging.
    ●Puzzle-solving is closely integrated with the plot. Solve the puzzles and uncover the truth hidden beneath layers of mist.

short_description: A 3D side-scrolling adventure game, you will dive into a bizarre dark world and unlock the secrets hidden in it. Use the props you've earned to fight against a variety of sanity-shattering monsters and bosses, challenge creative decryption, explore chilling truths, and reveal your ultimate destiny..
